attributes.action: immediately provide 'Departure Centres' (of the style portrayed in the film Soylent Green) so that people who reach the age of 60 who are devastatingly dismayed at the continuing degradation of this country - especially after Alastair McDarlings Budget, today - may go there, have a large gin and tonic, press a button and leave this mortal coil behind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
